sentence.text: The signaling of DNA cellular protein catabolic process and replication stress involves a multitude of proteins, including the kinases ataxia-telangiectasia mutated (protein phosphorylation) and ATM and Rad3-related (actin cytoskeleton reorganization), and proteins with double-strand break repair via homologous recombination COOH-terminal (BRCT) domains.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination

sentence.text: Here, we show that breast-ovarian cancer susceptibility 1 (double-strand break repair via homologous recombination) interacts directly with actin cytoskeleton reorganization-interacting protein (ATRIP), an obligate partner of ATR.

entity.text: double-strand break repair via homologous recombination
